item.title: Mentioned by Straight.com
item.description:
NDP MP Jinny Sims calls upon the oppressed to support each other's struggles
Newton-North Delta NDP MP Jinny Sims has compared the Conservative government's immigration reforms to the exclusionary policies of the early 19th century. In a speech at the Firehall Centre for the Arts in Delta, Sims opened by saying that people of ...

item.title: Mentioned by Vancouver Sun
item.description:
BC NDP election review panel includes MP Jinny Sims
Jinny Sims, Newton-North Delta MP. Following its unexpected loss, the party said it would convene a panel that included representation from labour and more than one woman. The panel will evaluate the 2013 campaign to determine what went wrong, ...

item.title: Mentioned by Vancouver Sun
item.description:
Critic flays budget action to curb migrant worker abuse
B.C. NDP MP Jinny Sims said the proposed measures do nothing to prevent the exploitation of foreign workers who are often unaware of their rights. "This is one of hundreds of stories we hear about," Sims said Friday when told of the Centeno settlement.

item.title: Mentioned by Vancouver Sun
item.description:
Budget 'action' on migrant workers will do little to stop abuse, critic says
B.C. NDP MP Jinny Sims said the proposed measures do nothing to prevent the exploitation of foreign workers who are often unaware of their rights. “This is one of hundreds of stories we hear about,” Sims said Friday when told of the Centeno settlement.
